activities: Celldex collects personal information in connection with clinical trials, job applications and other HR functions, and when customers and clients voluntarily submit such information, for example, by requesting information about our products and services, signing up to receive information, and by submitting online information request of scientific inquiry forms.
corpofftitle1: Executive Vice President and Chief Medical Officer
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Client and customer data, clinical trial data, and human resources data
recoursemech: For organization human resources data: EU data protection authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner; for all other data: BBB EU Safe Harbor program
